name: 林祐民
objective:
這門課程旨在帶大家全面了解樂團音樂的多樣性和歷史發展。我們會從樂團的歷史講起，依次深入巴洛克與文藝復興、古典主義、浪漫主義、民族主義、印象主義以及當代主義的世界。透過影片或現場音樂會，大家將感受到不同指揮詮釋與表演風格的魅力。此外，我們會探討歌劇的起源、發展和改革，特別是莫札特的歌劇藝術和義大利歌劇的輝煌時期。在課程中，學生將進行報告，涵蓋木管、銅管、弦樂及打擊樂器，促進對各類樂器的理解與研究。這門課程既充滿知識，又不乏樂趣，將幫助你深入理解管絃樂的迷人世界。
This course provides a comprehensive overview of orchestral music's diversity and history. Starting with the orchestra's origins, we'll explore Baroque, Renaissance, Classical, Romantic, Nationalistic, Impressionistic, and Contemporary music styles. Through videos and live concerts, you'll experience different conducting and performance styles. We'll also cover the origins and development of opera, focusing on Mozart and the golden age of Italian opera. Students will give presentations on woodwind, brass, string, and percussion instruments. This engaging course aims to deepen your understanding of the fascinating world of orchestral music.
